snippet: By graduating from high school, Mary Brown has already achieved something that eludes many who grow up in foster care. Now she hopes to do something rarer still: earn a college degree.
abstract: Community Services Society, one of the seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, provides Mary Brown of the Bronx with funds for food, utilities and transportation as she works toward her associate degree at Bronx Community College.
lead_paragraph: By graduating from high school, Mary Brown has already achieved something that eludes many who grow up in foster care. Now she hopes to do something rarer still: earn a college degree.

headline.main: A Childhood in Foster Care Didn’t Diminish Her Dreams
headline.print_headline: Foster Care Didn’t Diminish Her Dreams

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations
